topic.title: Moving and Placing the Mini PDU

body.p:
Move the Mini PDU off its pallet with a forklift as follows:
The Mini PDU is attached to its pallet by its seismic brace with wood screws. With the pallet resting on the floor, remove the wood screws.
Insert forklift or palette jack forks under the Mini PDU cabinet on long side of the unit. Be careful not to damage the casters or the seismic brace.
Move the unit to its installation location next to server racks and withdraw the forklift. Unit has casters and can be precisely rolled into position. Seismic brace must face opposite the server rack.
Adjust leveling feet to stabilize the unit using an open wrench.
Secure seismic brace to floor. Installer chooses and provides attachment hardware.
Seismic Brace
